name: Pillar
description: Lost in an intimate snowy town, a palette of individuals are in search of a mysterious artifact said to bring great knowledge and understanding. Lead each character through their quest in this collection of minigames, each with unique personalities and challenges...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB of video RAM, support for 4096 x 4096 textures, Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 705 MB available space Sound Card: Required

reviews.review_text: I would warmly recommend this to any puzzle lover or even to those whom just aint supergreat at them like me. One of the few games that has really held me captivated to the very end and made me play again to find all secrets.  + Charming & Sweet Art  + Good atmospheric music  + fairly challenging puzzles (Not too difficult and not too easy) + Good Secrets  Not entirely sure on what is going on storywise but that could be just me..
This game sucks ♥♥♥. I have no ♥♥♥♥ing clue what the developers were thinking. DO NOT BUY  -10/10
